total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation of the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that the colors in the input grid are swapped in the output grid. Identify the colors that are swapped in each example.
Q3: Apply the same color swapping rule to the input grid of the quiz. Identify the colors that need to be swapped.
Q4: Swap the identified colors in the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
